entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is in contact with someone, and she is also the one who suggests that Harry should teach them how to defend themselves against Voldemort. She is described as cool, pink-faced, exasperated, anxious, and mite anxious.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is accusing Hermione of being in contact with someone, and he is also the one who is watching her. He is described as accusatory and pathetic.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is being asked to teach them how to defend themselves against Voldemort, and he is also the one who is considering this request. He is described as a nutter.

entities.name: voldemort
